alert.note: Alert for Bracken; Mason; Pendleton; Robertson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 17 at 9:14PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...SHOWERS WITH GUSTY WINDS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF MASON, ROBERTSON, BRACKEN, SOUTHEASTERN PENDLETON, SOUTHEASTERN CLERMONT, SOUTHERN BROWN AND WESTERN ADAMS COUNTIES THROUGH 1000 PM EST... At 913 PM EST, showers were located along a line extending from near Neville to 6 miles southwest of Cynthiana, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Maysville, Georgetown, Washington, West Union, Manchester, Ripley, Aberdeen, Augusta, Winchester, Seaman, Felicity, Lewisburg, Brooksville, Decatur, Russellville, Mount Olivet, Dover, Higginsport, Cherry Fork and Germantown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
